name: Combomino
description:
Our game for the Discord Jam #7

Summary

Fit dominos together with the same color to make combo chains, until your reach the highest score. And then make your own levels.


Theme

The theme for the jam was Combo. Here the more tiles of the same color are connected the more points you get.

Controls

Mouse : Left button to place, Right to rotate, middle to undo
Everything else is on the screen.

Edit you own maps

While editing a map you can copy the Map as string to save it. You can share that map to your friends or in the comments. To play a custom map just copy the string and paste it in the level selection screen (bottom right).


Credits

- SturmElfe : Graphics and animation

- Garazbolg : Programming, Game design, Audio

We look forward to seeing your highscore and your levels. Have fun.
